#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define se second
#define fi first


using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair < int, int > pii;
typedef pair < int , pii > tuple;
typedef vector < int > vi;
const int MAX = 1e4+5;
const int INF = 1e9+9;

int main(){
	
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	
	int x,y,r,ans, a;
	
	while( t-- ){
		ans = -1;
		r = INF;
		for( int i = 0 ; i < 10; i++ ){
			x = INF;
			y = 0;
			for( int j = 0 ; j < 15;j++ ){
				cin >> a;
				x = min(x, a);
				y = max(y, a);
			}
			if( r >= y-x ){
				r = y-x;
				ans = i+1;
			}	
		}
		cout << ans << " " << r << endl;
	}	
	
	
	
	return 0;
}
